# samsungcloudplatformv2_filestorage_volume (Data Source)

Show Volume

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_filestorage_volume" "volume" {
  id = var.id
}

output "volume" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_filestorage_volume.volume
}

variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
